fields_of_interest: Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: All initiatives from the Commission affecting airlines in the field of aeropolitical, regulatory and environmental field. Meeting members of the European Parliament to learn more about their understanding and their initiatives in the fields described above.
relevant_communication: For my clients it is important to understand the possible impact on their operation to or within Europe. Therefore, I need to understand the regulation,  for example the new regulation which will replace 868/2004. The same goes for the aviation ETS and/or Implementation of the MRV. I would like to participate in that special events. Like in the noise conference April 24,  where I participted
goals__remit: Offering Consultancy Services for airlines and the maritime  industry in the field of aeropolitical, regulatory and environmental affairs taking into account my more than 30 years experience in the aviation sector
